column5: We've doubled the size of everyone's PM  boxes. Please delete the ones you no longer need. Our disk space is approaching half our allotment. We may try and find ways to host some of the files off server, but I don't want to ahve to do that if I can avaoid it. We are currently holding 500Gb of information on this site....some of it even pertains to fishing.
....LOL, ya I've noticed that, not sure how it happened.
Wow you guys don't waste any time granting wishes.  Now how about world peace?  Ahhh Nevermind!
Thank you guys!! I am sure alot of members appreciate it!  Gerritt.
Wow.. quick work! thanks alot rick.   Kevin
